Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/Cuyler
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Irving Park, Ashland, Montrose, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/Cuyler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Irving Park, Ashland, Montrose, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/Cuyler.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
